title: what if veigar's q
body: would bounce around  his e walls like a pinball if you don't implement it on veigar i think it would be a cool idea for a new champ

replies.body: I know this isn't a for sure, but I honestly do believe that Riot can and would implement this champ, hopefully. That's a hella cool concept. But she uses the reflection refraction concept and I love it
His new Q is awesome already. Its definitely a buff over his old one. Whats killing him is the changes to his E
We need a J4 wall with this concept.

That's a really neat concept.  For a new champ the walls would need to not do damage or cc.  Perhaps an ultimate kinda like Maokai, where the area increases damage dealt by the champs abilities and give new effects like the ricochet.
